Description: National Ocean Economics Program (NOEP) Ocean Economy data for number of jobs in tourism sectors that directly or indirectly depend upon the ocean
Target: Annual job growth in ocean related sectors is equal to or greater than the national annual average job growth

Description: Number of beach day closures as recorded by the EPA Beach Closure Data
Target: At least 100 days free of any beach closures, representing the average length of the swimming season for the region

Description: Coastal points identified for human use by NOAA's Environmental Sensitivity Index
Target: At least one access point every mile of coastline
